name: Ski Ties Ultimate Ski Harness - Children
categories: Toddler ski harness and teaching equipment
description: A great tool for getting your kids out on skis and getting them started in the world of shred.Textured inner fabric and double leg straps keep the harness in place.Padded waistbelt has leash attachments.Pull handle helps lift kids back up if they fall down.16-foot leash included.
